creditline: Gift of Howard and Dorothy Pramann from the Mrs. M.J. McKelvy Estate, St. Cloud, MN
description: three young women dressed in traditional Japanese attire seated around a tea serving caddy (?), with a teapot in the center; woman at left holds an open book; hand coloring: woman at left wears pale blue and pink, woman at right wears lavender

title: Japanese Ladies, from a photography album with images of Japan
